node.title: Announcing DigiThree Labs

node.title: GetTFT.com is Live
node.excerpt: We are happy to share that anyone can now buy TFT directly with the world's most popular cryptocurrency, Bitcoin.

node.title: What's New in Grid 3.0.1!
node.excerpt: Today we are sharing what’s new in TF Grid 3.0.1, now live on Testnet and Devenet – and the path to Mainnet!

node.title: How ThreeFold Provides a Secure IT Ecosystem
node.excerpt: Apple and Google's critical security updates are examples of why the world needs ThreeFold's secure IT ecosystem.

node.title: Validator Node Update
node.excerpt: In support of the establishment of ThreeFold’s DAO we have officially opened registrations for the first L2 and L0 validators.

node.title: This ThreeFold Farm Keeps Veggies Warm
node.excerpt: Somewhere in the Netherlands, a ThreeFold Farm is supporting the growth of vegetable crops such as tomatoes, peppers and cucumbers.

node.title: What Bitcoin did to money, ThreeFold is doing to the Internet
node.excerpt: As the Internet is struggling with issues due to its centralized model, ThreeFold spent the last six years developing a new open-source peer-to-peer Internet infrastructure from the ground up.

node.title: Building a New Internet From the Ground Up – Part 4: Network
node.excerpt: We're (finally) back with part 4, looking at the networking aspects of the ThreeFold Grid.

node.title: Connecting the Dots: ThreeFold plans to scale globally
node.excerpt: ThreeFold started as an idea about ten years ago and is now manifesting itself into the most comprehensive peer-to-peer Internet and cloud infrastructure in the world. The potential of our technology to revolutionize digitization globally is endless and limited only to our collective imagination.

node.title: Building a New Internet From the Ground Up – Part 3: Compute
node.excerpt: Part three of an approachable series on the inner workings of the ThreeFold Grid. This time, we're exploring compute.

node.title: It's Time We Stand Up For Our Data
node.excerpt: As consumers, we should be able to trust that our data is truly safe and secure. And today, we cannot. It's time we stand up for what is ours.

node.title: Can a 'Democratized' Internet exist in times of a Cyber War?
node.excerpt: With cyber sovereignty turning into a non-territorial challenge to sovereignty itself irrespective of the virtual realm of the internet, is there a way out for humanity?

node.title: How ThreeFold Can Truly Decentralize Blockchain
node.excerpt: Is a blockchain truly decentralized if it is being hosted on a centralized solution? We say, no.

node.title: Decentralizing the Internet
node.excerpt: In this article, we discuss the general concept of a ‘decentralized grid’ and how anyone can plug-in capacity to the ThreeFold Grid.

node.title: Response - The Internet is Destroying Our Brains, but We Can't Quit
node.excerpt: A response to a poignant article written by P.E. Moskowitz on the dangers of today's Internet.

node.title: The Internet is Moving to the Edge
node.excerpt: With emerging technologies like IoT, Web 3 and more, computing needs to be pushed from centralized data centers to the edge of the network. Learn why ThreeFold is the ideal foundation for a thriving interconnected future.

node.title: Interview – Designing Solutions for a P2P Future
node.excerpt: An interview with Jonas Delrue from Jimber, the team developing P2P solutions like video chat and office workspace, using the Digital Twin platform. Digital Twin is a use case on top of the ThreeFold Grid.

node.title: Peer-to-Peer Overcomes Web3 Challenges
node.excerpt: The promise of Web3 is tremendous, but there are clear limitations to overcome. How? Peer-to-peer systems and blockchains, side by side. The best of both worlds.

node.title: A Journey through the Decentralization and Blockchain Space – Part Four: Storj
node.excerpt: Follow me to the fourth stop on my journey through the space. This time, we’re looking into Storj!

node.title: Co-Realizing the Promise
node.excerpt: Together with our global community, we're realizing the initial promise of an open-source, peer-to-peer Internet owned by the people.

node.title: Our Quest to Fully Decentralize the Internet
node.excerpt: It's our mission to transform the Internet and Cloud. Learn more about the status quo and how we're working on fully decentralizing the entire Internet!

node.title: The ThreeFold Grid is by the People, For the People
node.excerpt: ThreeFold's open source technology powers the peer-to-peer Internet revolution that holds the premise to disrupt the global Internet in many ways.

node.title: Into the Fold – The ThreeFold Movement
node.excerpt: It's not by mistake that you're here, reading this post. You can feel that a global shift is happening. And you want to do something about it.

node.title: Why is ThreeFold P2P Cloud the better solution for customers than Amazon Web Services or Microsoft Azure?
node.excerpt: As we’ve recently been exploring decentralized projects to see where ThreeFold is in the space and where we stand out, we thought it’s a good time to also look into how we compare to traditional, centralized cloud providers.

node.title: What Is Peer-to-Peer and Why Is It so Important?
node.excerpt: P2P systems are network, not linear or pyramidal hierarchies (though they may share some elements)..
